name: Apple iPad mini 2 16GB WiFi
shortDescription: "Bigger screen than a smartphone; smaller and more convenient than a laptop — don't let the in-between size of this mini tablet fool you, because this powerful little device boasts some serious computing chops in a sleekly-designed package. The Apple iPad mini 2 offers a stunning 7.9"" Retina display with over 3.1 million pixels, so photos and videos look incredibly detailed and text is razor sharp. The device features a powerful and power-efficient A7 chip with 64-bit architecture, so it's  remarkably responsive — while still delivering up to 10 hours of battery life on a single charge. The iPad mini 2 also offers ultrafast wireless, iSight and FaceTime HD cameras, and includes some awesome apps like iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, Pages, Numbers and Keynote.1 All this, and it still fits easily in one hand.Apple iPad mini 2 with Retina Display with Wi-Fi Space Gray or Silver:"
longDescription: <b><br>Apple iPad mini with Retina Display with Wi-Fi Space Gray or Silver:</b><ul><li>7.9" Apple iPad with retina display</li><li>A7 chip with M7 motion coprocessor</li><li>Built-in Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) with MIMO support</li><li>Up to 10 hours of battery life<sup>1</sup></li><li>5MP iSight camera with 1080p HD video recording</li><li>FaceTime HD camera</li><li>iPhoto, iMovie, GarageBand, Pages, Numbers and Keynote apps included</li><li>Apple iPad mini 2 WiFi 16gb has over 475,000 apps on the App Store<sup>2</sup></li><li>iOS 7 and iCloud</li><li>Cellular data service on Wi-Fi + cellular models (sold separately)</li><li>Available in space gray or silver</li></ul>1 - Battery life varies by use and configuration. See www.apple.com/batteries for more information. <br>2 - Refers to the total number worldwide. Not all content is available in all countries.

name: Slumber 1 - 8'' Spring Mattress-In-a-Box, Multiple Sizes
shortDescription: Sleep more comfortably at night with a convenient Slumber 1-8'' Mattress in a Box (Multiple Sizes). It is ready to use on platform beds and easy to set up for standard beds. The Slumber 1 Mattress in a Box features a firm and tightly wound top bed mattress with integrated individual spring coils that provide a customized feel that conforms to the shape of your body. The springs are spaced close enough to provide optimal support, yet far enough apart to increase motion separation and provide more undisturbed rest. The tight top mattress also features breakthrough rebound technology, meaning that the mattress is tightly packed when shipped to conserve space and naturally expands in just a few hours. Other bedding accessories, like foundations and bed frames, are available separately. Each Slumber 1-8'' Mattress in a Box (Multiple Sizes) comes complete with a 10-year limited warranty.
longDescription: <b><br>Slumber 1-8" Mattress in a Box, Multiples Sizes:</b><ul><li>Tight top bed mattress with individual spring coils</li><li>Revolutionary rebound technology lets the Mattress in a Box expand when unpacked</li><li>Increased motion separation: springs provide undistributed rest</li><li>Slumber 1 spring mattress is constructed to adjust individually to your weight and body shape</li><li>Heavier gauge steel coil for durability and comfort with the Slumber 1 Mattress in a Box</li><li>Mattress is tightly packed and vacuum sealed, please allow 72 hours to return to original shape</li><li>Twin dimensions: 75" x 39" x 8"</li><li>Full dimensions: 75" x 54" x 8"</li><li>Queen dimensions: 80" x 60" x 8"</li><li>King dimensions: 80" x 76" x 8"</li><li>Also available: Smart Base Steel Bed frame in Twin/Full and Queen/King</li><li>Beds sold separately; see our assortment of beds</li><li>Bed frames sold separately; see our assortment of bed frames</li><li>Great for platform beds; requires foundation or box spring with standard bed frames</li><li>Foundations sold separately; see our assortment of foundations</li><li>Slumber 1 Mattress in a Box includes a 10-year limited warranty</li></ul>

name: "Cheetah Print 17"" Backpack"
shortDescription: "This Cheetah Print Backpack is a fun way for kids to transport their things to and from school. It can hold a variety of necessities, such as books, folders, paper and pencils. This 17"" backpack can be wiped clean with a damp cloth."

name: "Black 15"" Zip Front Pocket Backpack"
shortDescription: This stylish sharks in blue backpack is fashionable and versatile. Its padded straps make it comfortable to wear and its extra pocket for storing smaller items makes it great for wherever you're headed, whether it's a play date or to school.
longDescription: <br> <b>15" Printed Zip Front Pocket Backpack</b>: <ul><li>100% polyester</li><li>Front zipper pocket</li><li>Padded straps</li><li>Top handle</li><li>Measures 15" x 11"</li><li>Material: polyester</li><li>Imported</li></ul>

name: "Front-Twisted Chain 17"" Backpack, Blue"
shortDescription: Tough design. Stylish features. Mesh pockets for your water bottles and accessories. Enough storage for short trips or long adventures... All you need at a price you cannot beat!
longDescription: Front Twisted Chain Backpack:100% polyesterAdjustable straps for personalized fitComfortable padded shoulder strapsPolyester liningFront pocket with zipper closureAdditional side pocket with mesh detailsNylon loops on frontTop handle included
